faq.title: Clear answers for students and companies
faq.subtitle: Short, direct responses to the most common questions about how HSOCIETY works.

items.question: Is this beginner-friendly?
items.answer: Yes. The training starts at the foundations and is designed for people with no prior offensive security experience.

items.question: Do students work on real companies?
items.answer: Students participate in supervised, real-world engagements where scope and safety are controlled by senior operators.

items.question: Are engagements supervised?
items.answer: Yes. Every engagement is led and reviewed by experienced offensive security professionals.

items.question: How are companies protected?
items.answer: All tests are scoped, authorized, monitored, and reported with clear remediation guidance and evidence.

items.question: What makes HSOCIETY different?
items.answer: We combine training with real execution. Students become professionals by contributing to supervised pentests.
